sentences.en: A sprinkler passing by, I was dashed with water.
sentences.cn: 一辆洒水车驶过, 洒了我一身水.

sentences.en: A sprinkler sprinkles water on the roads to lay the dust.
sentences.cn: 洒水车将水洒在路上以不使尘土飞扬.

sentences.en: Alarms went off and the sprinkler system turned on.
sentences.cn: 顿警铃大响,漏水系统也启动了.

sentences.en: Develop a kind of new sprinkler head - sprinkler head of rotary water sprinkler.
sentences.cn: 开发出一种新型喷头 —— 旋转式水喷淋喷头.

sentences.en: Elevated steel tanks for private use, such as those for sprinkler supply, also performed poorly.
sentences.cn: 私人用的架立钢水塔, 例如贮水用的水塔, 也表现不好.

sentences.en: Erica: Our office also has a sprinkler system installed in the ceiling.
sentences.cn: 艾瑞卡: 我们办公室的天花板也装了消防洒水系统.

sentences.en: FAS ( Fire - fighting Automation System ), includes automatic fire alarm system and sprinkler system.
sentences.cn: FAS消防自动化系统, 自动火灾报警、自动喷淋系统.

sentences.en: If you have a small yard, you'd better use a portable sprinkler.
sentences.cn: 若你的庭院不大, 最好用可携带式的浇水器.

sentences.en: Measure distances between sprinkler heads for irrigation.
sentences.cn: 花洒头之间的距离测量用于灌溉.

sentences.en: Most field sprinklers use a rotating sprinkler head of the general type.
sentences.cn: 大部分田间喷灌采用通用的旋转式喷头.

sentences.en: P How about the heat detectors and sprinkler systems?
sentences.cn: 警报警器和喷淋系统还好 吗 ?

sentences.en: Sprinkler heads at the store , if any, shall be blank off.
sentences.cn: 如该仓库有消防花洒头, 须予以封闭.

sentences.en: The sprinkler is composed of sprinkler frame, sealant and glass bulb.
sentences.cn: 该喷头主要由喷头架 、 密封件及玻璃球组成.

sentences.en: Today's world, a lot of places left already sprinkler and farm cattle, leaving even plangent machine times.
sentences.cn: 今天的世界，许多地方早已离别了水车和耕牛，甚至正在离别轰鸣的机器时代。

sentences.en: Walk with care around memorial tablets, lawn vases and sprinkler heads.
sentences.cn: 步行小心周围的牌位 、 草地、花瓶和喷头.

sentences.en: You start by helping the child feel more secure around water by just having fun on a slip and slide with the sprinkler.
sentences.cn: 起先，你要通过利用洒水器，让孩子从中感受到滑上滑下的快乐，使他觉得在水的周围更加安全。

phrases.tran_cn: 自动喷水灭火系统；自动洒水装置

trans.tran_cn: 洒水器，喷洒器，（建筑物内的）自动喷水灭火装置
trans.tran_en: a piece of equipment used for scattering water on grass or soil
